properties.entry: SELECT A.ORDER_CODE, B.USER_NAME, C.STORE_NAME, A.ORDER_TIME, A.TOTAL_AMOUNT, B.USER_PHONE, D.USER_PHONE "StoPhone" FROM ORDER_TABLE A JOIN USER_TABLE B ON(A.USER_CODE = B.USER_CODE) JOIN STORE_TABLE C ON(A.STORE_CODE = C.STORE_CODE) JOIN USER_TABLE D ON(C.USER_CODE = D.USER_CODE)
